meanings.sent1: The book was multipage, with many pages to read.
meanings.sent2: The report was multipage, containing information on several sheets.
meanings.sent3: The multipage manual was so long, it could double as a doorstop.
meanings.sent4: Her multipage essay was a journey through different ideas and arguments.
meanings.sent5: The multipage document felt like a never-ending story, each page revealing more.

meanings.definition: A document or publication that spans multiple pages.
meanings.sent1: I printed out the multipage contract for you to review.
meanings.sent2: The multipage brochure showcased all the products available.
meanings.sent3: The multipage menu at the restaurant made choosing a dish difficult.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook turned into a multipage masterpiece of doodles and notes.
meanings.sent5: The multipage magazine captivated readers with its colorful images and articles.
